title: Pam’s Court
description: This is the court room of Judge Pam, and Judge Pam has the final word. We’ll see you in court.
quote: I sentence you to stay tuned.
altHero: Judge Pam on the stand holding up her gavel
alt2: Judge Pam speaking while holding her gavel
alt3: Bob Belcher points at Jimmy Pesto and his lawyer
alt4: the Belchers are smothered with orange foam from above
